    • Method Detail

      • cleanup

        public void cleanup(DbUnitConfiguration configuration,
           CleanupDB cleanupDB)
             throws Exception
        Performs a cleanup operation. If no tables filters are specified in configuration, data from entire database will be cleanup. Otherwise, a partial cleanup will be performed.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • inject

        public void inject(DbUnitConfiguration configuration,
          InjectDataSet injectDataSet)
            throws Exception
        Performs a inject operation. If no tables filters are specified in configuration, the whole dataset is injected. Otherwise, only a subset will be injected.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • filter

        public static org.dbunit.dataset.IDataSet filter(org.dbunit.dataset.IDataSet source,
                                 DbUnitConfiguration configuration)
        Filters the dataset according to includes and excludes in the configuration.
